thread.title: Your first trade for Wednesday, March 14

title: Your first trade for Wednesday, March 14
text:
The " Fast Money " traders shared their first moves for the market open. 
Dan Nathan was a buyer of Target . 
Brian Kelly was a buyer of SPDR Gold Shares . 
Karen Finerman was a buyer of Citigroup . 
Guy Adami was a buyer of Eli Lilly . 
Trader disclosure: On March 13, 2018, the following stocks and commodities mentioned or intended to be mentioned on CNBC's "Fast Money" were owned by the "Fast Money" traders: Dan is short IWM, QQQ, SPY. Brian Kelly is long Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin. Karen Finerman's firm is long AAPL, ANTM, C, FB, FL, FNAC, GOOG, GOOGL, GLNG, GMLP, JPM, JPM calls, KORS puts, LYV, SPY puts, SPY put spreads, WIFI. Her firm is short ESRX, IWM, MDY, VRX calls. Karen Finerman is long AAL, BAC, BOT Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, C, DAL, DVYE, DXJ, EEM, EPI, EWW, EWZ, DVYE, FB, FL, GM, GMLP, GLNG, GOGO, GOOG, GOOGL, JPM, LYV, KFL, KORS, KORS calls, KORS puts, MA, MTW, SEDG, SPY puts, TACO, URI, WIFI, WFM. Karen Finerman is short TBT calls. Bitcoin and Ethereum are in her kids' Trust.Guy Adami is long CELG, EXAS, GDX, INTC. Guy Adami's wife, Linda Snow, works at Merck.
